name: PM Surya Ghar Rooftop Solar
description: Free solar rooftop installation scheme for 1 crore households. Get up to 40% subsidy on installation costs and reduce electricity bills significantly.
eligibility: Own a house with a suitable roof
benefits: Sell excess power back to the grid
applicationGuide: Select a registered vendor for installation
Submit installation details for subsidy release

name: FAME India (EV)
description: Faster Adoption and Manufacturing of Electric Vehicles scheme with subsidies for EV purchase and charging infrastructure development.
benefits: Exemption from road tax in many states
Lower interest rates on EV loans
applicationGuide: Dealer applies for subsidy on behalf of buyer
Subsidy is deducted from the ex-showroom price
